website_summaries.verdict: While not a traditional edger, it's powerful enough to trim and do some light edge work.
pros: A gas-powered trimmer that doubles as an edger for providing a manicured look around gardens, sidewalks, fences, and more
Powerful 190 cc engine and large rear wheels can tackle heavy-duty tasks
cons: Heavy, so it's not the easiest machine to maneuver
Won't make well-defined lines like traditional edgers

customer_reviews.title: Tears up the brush
customer_reviews.text: Does what she is designed to do....whack weeds and thick brush. I've had good luck with Poulan products before, and there has been no exception with this one. Just got to the age where using a small gas trimmer was killing my arms, hands and back. This puts the trimmer head on the ground so you can take heavy brush head-on. Really tears up thick grass, heavy weeds and brushy areas.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: excellent machine. easily un-boxed (it folds nicely for shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent machine. easily un-boxed (it folds nicely for shipping and storage), oiled, fueled and fired up in minutes. works easily on everything except kudzu and small woody stems larger than about 1/8 inch. I suggest goats for the kudzu, hand held loppers (pruners) for the woody branches.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spangenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the second trimmer I got. The first one was damaged in shipping so I had to return it but had a chance to evaluate it. It was cheaply made and difficult to use. The Poulan Pro machine is absolutely great. Starts in one pull every time. Good height adjustment, rev control and looks and feel solid. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rdguy

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 30 min of grass trimming
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than 30 min of trimming grass, that gets Zero Stars, they refunded my purchase that gets 3 stars as I had to repackage and haul that thing back to town to ship it off, drain out the oil and gas....other than that got a refund in a couple weeks. Emailed them a photograph of the plastic broken part on the trimmer housing..Seriously that should be metal down there..
customer_reviews.author: Beach Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best wheeled trimmer and it is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th season using this wheeled weedtrimmer. Every Spring, I change the oil, clean or replace the two-stage air filters; and perform a thorough inspection. Mine has a Briggs & Stratton Model 120000, 625 Series engine. It starts with an easy first try pull every time. Nothing has broken. It is a bit bulky and it requires strength to push it over rough ground, but does a fine job while pulling it backwards over fairly even ground.
customer_reviews.author: HickoryC

customer_reviews.title: 27 cc is a pretty big discrepancy in motors that size
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this three stars because it is advertised as 190 cc. When it took it out of the box it states right across the top 163 cc. 27 cc is a pretty big discrepancy in motors that size. The larger motor was the main reason I chose this product. Had I known it was only 163 cc motor and not 190 cc. I would have chosen another brand. I feel decieved.
customer_reviews.author: sph1668

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected. Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! This machine works great!!!!! I had a little trouble with the line breaking in tall weeds with thick stalks, but I slowed down the speed & my cutting, it works MUCH better. It could stand to have larger wheels. I shopped around for several weeks, this was the best I found on the market. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ferge

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised that it would cut the thick stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good machine. Starts easily. I am 66 and am able to use it on hills with some effort. Wish it was just a little lighter. Cuts very well. Cuts tough thick brush and weeds. So far I have used it 4 or5 times and the cutting cable has never broken which really surprised me. Cuts through thick blackberries easily. A little expensive but well built and should hold up for years with minimal care.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for six weeks or so and I very happy that this is the machine I chose to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the machine to buy for the money! I am lucky that I have used several brands of this type of yard tool, so those experiences give me something to compare with. The six and a half hp. engine makes all the difference in the world. Watching it eat it's way through knee high and waist high weeds was impressive. Out of the box was a breeze to set up. Took a few extra minutes to make sure all nuts and bolts were tightened, filled it with gas and oil and it was running on the third pull. Been using it for six weeks or so and I very happy that this is the machine I chose to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... is a beast and I mean that in the best way. It is amazing what this will cut ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast and I mean that in the best way. It is amazing what this will cut down. The motor stars first pull every time.... so far. The line is easy to change.....no problems. It is a pretty heavy machine and does take some effort to push over rough ground, even so I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leon D. Chase

customer_reviews.title: You may get one pull like I did or 1000 but it will fail once ...
customer_reviews.text: ALL INTERNAL HOUSING ARE PLASTIC!!!!!!!! You may get one pull like I did or 1000 but it will fail once it gets brittle or snags. One Great BIG POS. Biggs and Strat aint what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: 5 months it stops working and won't start. Impossible to get help from the manufacturer. 5 calls and they still can't even refer me to someone who can help. Made a trip to their warranty repair shop and they wouldn't service the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: great, this machine takes the work out of trimming
customer_reviews.text: great, this machine takes the work out of trimming. The cord lasts much longer than I expected. And you do not have to carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert R. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: It's been an excellent piece of machinery
customer_reviews.text: It's been an excellent piece of machinery, no problems at all. Easy start, powerful and has done an excellent job cuttin in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: L Blanche

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Box was handled well by UPS. Easy to open handle for use. Good alternative to standard weedeater. I cannot hold a regular weekdeater due to neck and upper back issues. This handles well and am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Like many others
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I was disappointed when I order a 190cc trimmer and the unit I received was 163cc.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: A must-have if you're tired of holding gas trimmers!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of fence line to trim, so this is just perfect for getting it done without the pain of holding a gas trimmer for a long time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts tall grass and small brush really good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm missing two parts: 1. part no. 581 90 21 01, (#16) guide, rope; 2. part no. 581 91 26 01, (no.34)T-knob. Would appreciate the Company sending me those items.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Skrobarcek

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and an Exceptional machine.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and an Exceptional machine... Started with the first pull and made simple work of my Large job... I am a Poulan Customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Madscientist

customer_reviews.title: supercalifragilisticexpialidocious
customer_reviews.text: I am free as a bird now, taking the stairway to heaven
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy way to wack down weeds!
customer_reviews.text: Runs great, easy way to weed wack! I've used this since April 2017. Easy to pull start. I love this weed wacker!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Aliffi

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This Poulan works great made quick work of field cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very effective!
customer_reviews.text: This machine devours weeds, and super easy starting, excellent tool!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and to change cutting string. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy I

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a workhorse. Works great in our field to clear along the fences. My wife uses it too.
customer_reviews.author: Gary In Mississippi

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Just put gas in it & fired it up. It seems to work wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: C. John Buchanan Sr.

customer_reviews.title: great poulan pro
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to start . i am 74 years old and i love it because i have no trouble cutting weeds that are 5 feet tall on my country home property.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S. Verda

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: This Poulan product can tear apart thick growth with ease
customer_reviews.author: Zane Bybee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to start. Powerful trimmer. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: This item was advertised as 190 cc. The item I received was 163 cc product. The item was opened and did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Third one is a charm
customer_reviews.text: Well after having to send the first two back first one had a cracked gas tank the second a broken trimmer head the third one works great
customer_reviews.author: boardcutter

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, very happy with the way the mower cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poulan Pro.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is the beast cuts through tall grass like butter. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Brill

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I used on very heavy grass and it worked great. In about three hours of use I did not have to change the line and it took down weeds that my hand held weed eater would no cut. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Probst

customer_reviews.title: Everyboy who has weeeding problem this is the machine for you
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine not only cut 3ft weeds but pulverized them
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Cuts big weeds
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, light, and does a great job! Used around the ranch, you don’t have worry about breaking the blade on rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Budratz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the job. Also lose it in the bad fire
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is as easy as a pushing a lawnmower. And even I can change the string!
customer_reviews.author: birdlady7

customer_reviews.title: ... geting in way in tall weeds this thing was awesome
customer_reviews.text: Other than the extra large guard geting in way in tall weeds this thing was awesome
customer_reviews.author: rodney newman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine only downside is trimmer line is spendy and this monster eats it up
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine  Easy: setup,restring,& start
customer_reviews.text: Negative-If you have uneven tarrain w/rocks you'll want a machine with bigger wheels.
customer_reviews.author: music2

customer_reviews.title: love this machine does all and more great on your ...
customer_reviews.text: love this machine does all and more great on your back my weeds were so tall that it just ate them up no problem
customer_reviews.author: mary jane cramer

customer_reviews.title: Easier than conventional hand held for most things.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and good on grasses and medium weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Konrad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Power easy to change String I wish the Wheels were Higher
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: This is a very poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poor quality product. Fell apart within 15min of use. Plastic adjuster assy broke by the second day of use and now on the third tank of fuel the belt that was made in Mexico fell a part. Not happy with purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Spotts

customer_reviews.title: It is not 190cc it is 163 cc
customer_reviews.text: It came with a broken handle knob, but Poulan Sent a new one in a couple days Works well starts 1st pull
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Archie Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer east to use
customer_reviews.text: Great trimmer east to use! Started on the first pull after adding the gas and oil. What a workhorse on the ranch.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Knudtsen

customer_reviews.title: Not your average weedwacker
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, except the cable that engages the head came off twice in the first 3 uses; I had to put a machine screw in the slot for the cable to keep it from slipping out of the over sized slot. So far my fix is working out. The paper work that came in the box shows a different design than I described, so some type of modification must have been made. When running it takes out tall grass with ease and the Briggs/Stratton engine is smooth and the speed can be adjusted; many of its competitors run at only wide open speed. Yes, I still would recommend this to the average guy who likes a challenge to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Powers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The yellow metal pulley bar broke in half on the right side connector on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Brush Strokes

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome machine. It cuts up weeds and grass like ...
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used it, the trimmer fell apart. The front pulley pulled out of its seating and the belt broke. I contacted Amazon about this over a week ago and have not heard anything back. It was supposed to be guaranteed until July 26, 2016 by Amazon, but it doesn't appear that their guarantee means that much. I am very disappointed. I feel like I have wasted $299.00 on a piece of junk. I bought a 2 year warranty but it says I have to wait until Amazon's warranty ends. Meanwhile, I have a $299.00 lawn trimmer I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Started on first pull right out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Started on first pull right out of the box. Makes quick work of thick growth. Take your time, learn how to steer without digging furrows and you will be amazed what this beast can clear. Should have gotten one long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sriecks

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT have the power I expected. Unable to ...
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT have the power I expected. Unable to handle the grass cutting I bought it for. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: ken larsen

customer_reviews.title: Pleased customer.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Plenty of power. A very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Donald F Spice

customer_reviews.title: Can not physically push across pasture with the clump of ...
customer_reviews.text: Can not physically push across pasture with the clump of grass. It twist the tall grass around shaft and stalls the engine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine.  Until it quits.
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. I have two Poulan Pro and Husqvarna weed whackers. Can't seem to keep them going. Tried calling to exercise warranty and can't seem to raise anyone. If I thought there was better out there for the money, I would try it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara T. Christison

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm-- cuts through brush/weeds like a hot knife ...
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm-- cuts through brush/weeds like a hot knife through butter. Easy to use. Should have bought this unit sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Panciera

customer_reviews.title: JUST DONT DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was way too big so the mower slid around inside. Everything was loose on the bottom of the box. The powder coating (paint) is totally scratched up. The yellow Poulan paint is off. The trimmer head will not spin because in shipping it came off. i now have to find a center to fix it because i cant return it. For a senior citizen, this is going to be difficult if not impossible to get it in my car to have them repair it. I WILL NOT BE ORDERING PRODUCTS LIKE THIS EVER AGAIN. TOTAL NIGHTMARE.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Van Beveren

product_meta.title: Poulan Pro PR22WT, 22 in. 190cc 675 EXI Series Briggs & Stratton Walk Behind String Trimmer
product_meta.description: The poulenc pro 22 in. 6.25'-Lb gross torque, 190 cc Briggs & Stratton engine high wheel walk behind string trimmer is designed for cutting taller & heavier brush. With a 22 in. Cutting width & 12 in. Wheels this trimmer rolls smoothly over rough & hilly terrain. Backed by poulenc pro 2-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Cutting Height is adjustable from 1.6 in. To 3.04 in.
With a cutting width of 22 in., large trim jobs get done in less time
Fixed line Advance uses standard 0.155 diameter trimmer line
Easy rolling high rear wheels for added maneuverability on any terrain
Designed to cut tall grass and Small brush; powered by a dependable Briggs & Stratton 625 Series engine,

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars90 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
